categories: Category:Star Wars: Episode IX The Rise of Skywalker actors

nodes.text: Dhani Harrison (born August 1, 1978) is a British musician, composer and songwriter who portrays FN-0878 in the 2019 film Star Wars: Episode IX The Rise of Skywalker. He is the son of the Beatles member George Harrison. In addition to being a member of the band thenewno2, he is known for his work as a composer; alongside his writing partner Paul Hicks, he scored the 2013 fantasy film Beautiful Creatures and the 2014 comedy Learning to Drive, as well as television series such as The Divide, Good Girls Revolt and the WGN TV series Outsiders.
